## My Travel Map
Check out the places I've visited around the world!

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
from geopy.geocoders import Nominatim

# List of cities
cities = [
    "Boston, MA, USA", "Chicago, IL, USA", "San Diego, CA, USA",
    "Los Angeles, CA, USA", "San Francisco, CA, USA", "Austin, TX, USA",
    "Denver, CO, USA", "London, UK", "Dublin, IE", "Paris, France",
    "Florence, IT", "Rome, IT", "Milan, IT", "Munich, DE", "Zurich, Switzerland",
    "Phuket, Thailand", "Tokyo, JP"
]

# Geocode cities
geolocator = Nominatim(user_agent="city_mapper")
latitudes, longitudes = [], []

for city in cities:
    location = geolocator.geocode(city)
    if location:
        latitudes.append(location.latitude)
        longitudes.append(location.longitude)
    else:
        latitudes.append(None)
        longitudes.append(None)

# DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame({
    "City": cities,
    "Latitude": latitudes,
    "Longitude": longitudes
})

# Plotly map
fig = px.scatter_geo(
    df,
    lat="Latitude",
    lon="Longitude",
    hover_name="City",
    projection="natural earth",
    title="Places I've Visited",
    template="plotly_dark"
)
fig.update_traces(marker=dict(size=10, color="cyan"))
fig.show()
```
